title: The Emperor's Sniper
description: In the dystopian world of 2070, only 25% of the human population has survived the mid-century disasters of Civil and Nuclear Wars, Famines and Disease. In what is left of the United States, most live in faceless apartment blocks inside the walled Settlement Zones. There they survive on their basic income and whatever they can steal, scavenge or barter. For the Ultras, the wealthy elites who control the ruthless Gov, life is good in the few surviving small towns.  A brilliant scientist has discovered a method of traveling through the Space/Time Continuum. Joining forces with his lifelong friend, they set out to use this discovery to become wealthy by stealing the treasures of the past and killing any who stand in their way.  They are well on their way when one of the partners decides that perhaps their efforts would be better spent preventing the horrors of the 21st Century by changing the events of the pastâ€¦
author: David H. Schneider
